name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google Search Console Performance Report link

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Takes the webpage you're looking at and opens the performance report in Google search console to the relevant page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Google Search Console hot link by Discoverable takes the webpage in your browser tab and deep links through to the page performance section of Google Search Console. Very simple stuff but highly satisfying. A great productivity tool for the SEO community.
